name: RotatrixTD
description:
Rotatrix Tower Defense is a simple game where instead of placing towers, you rotate existing towers on monorails! Manage various paths and juggle between the turrets to place them in the most optimal positions! Stay alive for as long as possible, and post your times in the comments below!

INSTRUCTIONS/HOW TO PLAY:

Click and drag the towers to a position of choice. The towers will shoot the nearest enemies automatically!
